name: Lucky Block Mod for Minecraft
description:
Lucky Block Mod for Minecraft is your go to guide for installing and using the Lucky Block in Minecraft on your Mac. Includes video tutorials, crafting recipes, instructions for mod install and download links.

- Download the Lucky Block Mod
- Download Forge

Video Tutorials:

- How to install Forge for Minecraft
- Downloading the Lucky Block Mod
- How to install a Mod
- Using Mods and Common Errors encountered with Lucky Block Mod
- How to craft a lucky block in survival mode
- Using Lucky Blocks
- Using Lucky Blocks in creative mode

This guide is unofficial and is not associated with or endorsed by Mojang AB. This application is for educational purposes only and does not include the Minecraft Game in the app, Minecraft must be downloaded separately. Internet connection required to download mod and forge. All items, names, places and other aspects of the game described in this application are trademarked and owned by their respective owners.
